name: fliQ
description:
A unique minimalist puzzle game, fliQ. Purpose of the game is to flip the pieces and make them in the right order and rotation according to given rule in a limited number of moves. Be careful about colors and rotation of the pieces and have fun.

Currently there are 15 levels in the game, I have a lot more interesting levels in mind. If you like the first 15 levels please leave a comment so I can increase the number and  complexity of the levels.

I came up with the idea for  fliQ in Bioinformatics class while studying genetic sequencing back in my university days. I took what we were doing on paper for genetic sequencing and made it simpler and more colorful.

This is a game I made for fun during my spare time. I plan to release one game from different genres every month. Please follow me if you'd like to see more projects in the future.

Enjoy!
